text:
<!everyone> hey folks! hope you're having a great friday :partyparrot:
last call for anyone NYC folks to register for our happy hour on MONDAY! first hour is an open bar on superpath's tab. we've got 20 people registered so far. <https://www.eventbrite.com/e/superpaths-first-internal-link-nyc-meetup-tickets-317720790437|hope to see ya there>!
---
new folks have seen this in their onboarding, but i wanted to share this. if you aren't sure where to post something, this is a handy guide. and if i ask you to move something, it's only bc i'm trying to keep things tidy. thank you all!
• “I want to share something i/my team created.” → <#C012AUSC85C|promotion>
• “I want to get quotes from B2B marketers for a post I’m working on.” → <#CKRJX5U5A|collab>
• “I want to hire freelance help.” → <#C021RFDHEMD|all-things-freelance>
• “I want to let people know that I’m taking on freelance work.” → <#C02RGHQ4HK7|hire-me>
• “I want to ask a beginner-level content marketing question.” → Please do some research first and if you can’t find an answer, use <#C014P2BJLER|general>.
• “I have a question about an app/SaaS tool/CMS options/etc.” → <#CN9UCQ92A|content-seo-tools>
• “I want to share a cool article or podcast I found.” → <#C016ENU9KNU|essential-reading>
---
:tv: = includes a video Q&A
:zap:️ = new this week
---
:star:*️ featured full-time roles:*
---
• Lexer is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/352929-director-brand-and-communications-lexer|Director, Brand and Communications> :zap:
• Code Climate is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/266650-content-marketing-associate-code-climate|Content Marketing Associate> and <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/263720-content-writer-code-climate|Content Writer> :zap:
• Metaplane is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/352845-senior-content-marketing-manager-metaplane|Senior Content Marketing Manager> :zap:
• Giant Machines is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/352363-brand-and-content-manager-giant-machines|Brand & Content Manager> :zap:
• Message Lab is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/347435-seo-specialist-message-lab|SEO Specialist> :zap:
• Learn In is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/347360-b2b-content-marketing-manager-help-people-close-skills-gaps-learn-in|B2B Content Marketing Manager> :zap:
• Quorum is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/340520-content-marketing-manager-dollar74k-dollar80k-ote-quorum|Content Marketing Manager> ($74k-$80k OTE)
• Bessemer Venture Partners is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/340062-senior-content-manager-bessemer-venture-partners|Senior Content Manager>
• Superpath is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/278470-content-and-community-manager-superpath|Content & Community Manager> (this role is now remote! :earth_americas:)
• Perforce Software, Inc is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/320549-senior-marketing-writer-helix-alm-perforce-software-inc|Senior Marketing Writer>
• Massive is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/320512-marketing-manager-communications-and-brand-massive|Marketing Manager, Communications and Brand>
• Gorgias is hiring an <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/307905-editorsenior-editor-gorgias|Editor/Senior Editor> (:wave: <@U01G4M62C5B>) :tv: (now w/ video Q&A)
• Built Technologies is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/292167-content-writer-built-technologies|Content Writer>
• Lox Club is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/286919-brand-marketing-manager-lox-club|Brand Marketing Manager>
• Stoke is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/279609-senior-content-strategist-stoke|Senior Content Strategist>
• Ripple is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/279329-content-marketing-manager-ripplex-ripple|Content Marketing Manager>
• Craze is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/278419-social-media-manager-craze|Social Media Manager>
• Original9 Media is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/278353-content-writer-original9-media|Content Writer>
• Pitch is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/277924-head-of-content-marketing-remote-pitch|Head of Content Marketing (Remote)>
• Paystone is hiring an <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/266652-inbound-marketing-manager-remote-canada-paystone|Inbound Marketing Manager>
• Verblio is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/229245-senior-manager-of-customer-experience-verblio|Senior Manager of Customer Experience>️ (:wave: <@U02EL2NBYGL>)
---
:writing_hand: *freelance projects:*
• QA Wolf is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/346859-technical-writer-with-experience-in-qa-and-software-development-qa-wolf|Technical Writer>
• Clearscope is hiring <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/340392-freelance-writers-clearscope|Freelance Writers>
• Jolly SEO is hiring <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/325989-writers-to-ghost-journalist-outreach-jolly-seo|Writers to Ghost Journalist Outreach> ️
• Sacra is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/295283-freelance-editor-sacra|freelance editor>

:female-technologist: *and more from the job board:*
---
• Leapsome is hiring for a bunch of positions :partyparrot::
    ◦ <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/353197-content-marketing-manager-de-dfm-leapsome|Content Marketing Manager (DE)> (Berlin) :zap:
    ◦ <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/353200-pr-and-communications-lead-dfm-leapsome|PR & Communications Lead> (Berlin) :zap:
    ◦ <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/353202-pr-and-communications-lead-dfm-leapsome|PR & Communications Lead> (New York) :zap:

    ◦ <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/353204-senior-marketing-designer-dfm-leapsome|Senior Marketing Designer> (New York) :zap:
    ◦ <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/353206-senior-product-marketing-manager-dfm-leapsome|Senior Product Marketing Manager> (Berlin) :zap:
    ◦ <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/353207-senior-product-marketing-manager-dfm-leapsome|Senior Product Marketing Manager> (New York) :zap:
• Help Scout is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/347002-growth-marketing-specialist-content-help-scout|Growth Marketing Specialist (Content)>
• Workera ai is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/340000-content-marketing-manager-workeraai|Content Marketing Manager>
• Canva is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/320872-content-marketing-manager-b2b-canva|Content Marketing Manager B2B>
• Rainforest QA is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/295192-senior-content-marketing-manager-rainforest-qa|Senior Content Marketing Manager> ️
• Original9 Media is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/291747-senior-editor-original9-media|Senior Editor>
• Visme is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/291665-content-marketing-manager-visme|Content Marketing Manager>
• Great Question is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/291354-content-manager-great-question|Content Manager>
• Bolster is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/249374-director-of-marketing-bolster|Director of Marketing> ($100-120k)️
have a great weekend!
:v: jimmy
